description: Changes user password(s) and/or access string.

parameters.name: AuthenticationMode
parameters.description: Denotes the user's authentication properties, such as whether it requires a password to authenticate. Type (string) --- Indicates whether the user requires a password to authenticate. All newly-created users require a password. Passwords (list) --- The password(s) used for authentication (string) ---

nested_params.name: Type
nested_params.description: Indicates whether the user requires a password to authenticate. All newly-created users require a password.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: Indicates the user status. Can be 'active', 'modifying' or 'deleting'.

nested_items.name: AccessString
nested_items.description: Access permissions string used for this user.

nested_items.name: ACLNames
nested_items.description: The names of the Access Control Lists to which the user belongs.

nested_items.name: MinimumEngineVersion
nested_items.description: The minimum engine version supported for the user.

nested_items.name: Authentication
nested_items.description: Denotes whether the user requires a password to authenticate.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the user requires a password to authenticate.

nested_items.name: PasswordCount
nested_items.description: The number of passwords belonging to the user. The maximum is two.

nested_items.name: ARN
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the user.
